name: Ironheart Thundertop
personality_traits: Steadfast in the face of adversity
backstory_short: Born into a lineage of esteemed warriors, Ironheart was raised to uphold the ironclad values of the Ironhold Clans. Forged in the fires of battle, he seeks to protect his people and their way of life, even when it means standing against those who would challenge or undermine their steadfastness.
